item.title: Steve DiPaola at Dorkbot, SF, 2018
item.description: I ended up missing this recent Dorkbot night, so glad to see the talk turning up online - this is great! Steve DiPaola, Computational/Cognitive Modelling of Expression & Creativity, Dorkbot-SF, 2018-01-31 from pronoiac on Vimeo.
